Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Includes additional community districts in which pilot programs to address the legalization or conversion of certain basement and cellar dwellings can be established by local law
Summary: Includes additional community districts in which pilot programs to address the legalization or conversion of certain basement and cellar dwellings can be established by local law.
LawCode: Amd ยง289, Mult Dwell L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the multiple dwelling law, in relation to the community districts in which pilot programs to address the legalization or conversion of certain basement and cellar dwellings can be established by local law
